articles.title: Disney is giving Splash Mountain a new name in 2024 - KTLA Los Angeles
articles.description: Disney announced plans to overhaul Splash Mountain back in 2020, but the company has only recently announced its new name.
articles.content:
Splash Mountain will have a new name and a completely new look at Disney Parks in 2024.
On Friday, the Disney Parks Blog revealed new details of the “reimagined” ride, which will be themed after Dis… [+2040 chars]

articles.title: The 8 best short movies to watch at home - Polygon
articles.description: Looking for a good, short movie to watch? Here are eight great movies you can watch at home that are 85 minutes or less, or shorter than a Stranger Things 4 episode.
articles.content: Weve all been there before: looking for a movie to watch, with limited time and/or energy, only to find all the options youre interested in are longer than you have the space for. Occasionally, this … [+6052 chars]

articles.title: Jerry Hall 'truly devastated' after Rupert Murdoch told her their marriage was over via email, report says - Yahoo News
articles.description: Media mogul Rupert Murdoch told Jerry Hall that their marriage was over via email and asked that they only communicate through attorneys, per The Mail+.
articles.content:
Model Jerry Hall is "heartbroken" after media mogul Rupert Murdoch told her their marriage was over via email, according to The Mail+.
